description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF A HIP TO GABLE AND REAR ROOF DORMER EXTENSION WITH INSTALLATION OF TWO ROOFLIGHTS TO THE FRONT SLOPE.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations comprising the erection of a hip to gable and rear roof dormer extension would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations comprising the installation of two roof lights in the front roof slope and obscure glazed fixed shut windows in the flank elevation would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The applicant should be aware that the site may provide a useful habitat for Swifts. Swifts are currently in decline in the UK and in order to encourage and improve the conservation of Swifts the applicant is advised to consider the installation of a Swift nesting box/bricks on the site.
